ENTRY       R00268                      Reaction
NAME        oxalosuccinate carboxy-lyase (2-oxoglutarate-forming)
DEFINITION  Oxalosuccinate <=> 2-Oxoglutarate + CO2
EQUATION    C05379 <=> C00026 + C00011
COMMENT     the second step of two-step reaction (see R00267, R01899+R00268)
            following after R01899
RCLASS      RC00626  C00026_C05379
ENZYME      1.1.1.42
PATHWAY     rn00020  Citrate cycle (TCA cycle)
            rn01100  Metabolic pathways
            rn01110  Biosynthesis of secondary metabolites
            rn01120  Microbial metabolism in diverse environments
            rn01130  Biosynthesis of antibiotics
            rn01210  2-Oxocarboxylic acid metabolism
MODULE      M00009  Citrate cycle (TCA cycle, Krebs cycle)
            M00010  Citrate cycle, first carbon oxidation, oxaloacetate => 2-oxoglutarate
            M00740  Methylaspartate cycle
ORTHOLOGY   K00031  isocitrate dehydrogenase [EC:1.1.1.42]
DBLINKS     RHEA: 19384
